snippet.title: PC Longplay [283] Alone in the Dark 3
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Deskawa

This is the sequel to Alone in the Dark 2, launched in 1994 . This time they corrected most of AITD2's gameplay mistakes but unfortunately it seems to be a less inspired game when it comes to graphics, music and story. It's still a good action adventure with a unique setting. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
